messages.title: MY PLEDGES:
messages.content:
STRAIGHT TALKING POLITICS
I will be honest about where I stand on key issues such as Brexit.

ENDING THE GRAVY TRAIN
Unlike Sir Graham Brady, I won't employ family members on £40k+.

NO SECOND JOBS
Sir Graham Brady has multiple jobs - if elected I will be a full time MP.

KEEPING IN TOUCH
I will keep you updated on my work and hold regular advice surgeries.

OPENNESS AND TRANSPARENCY
I will publish my expenses claims online for all residents to see.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will be honest about where I stand on key issues such as Brexit.
Unlike Sir Graham Brady, I won't employ family members on £40k+.
Sir Graham Brady has multiple jobs - if elected I will be a full time MP.
I will keep you updated on my work and hold regular advice surgeries.
I will publish my expenses claims online for all residents to see.

mentions.tacticalSituation: ONLY LABOUR CAN BEAT THE TORIES IN ALTRINCHAM AND SALE WEST
